author: xtqqczze
body:
Empty `returns` documentation tag is inappropriate, it may as well be removed. In some cases the tag is even included on methods with void return value.

* Enable [SA1615](https://github.com/DotNetAnalyzers/StyleCopAnalyzers/blob/master/documentation/SA1615.md): Element return value should be documented.
* Enable [SA1616](https://github.com/DotNetAnalyzers/StyleCopAnalyzers/blob/master/documentation/SA1616.md): Element return value documentation should have text (as suggestion).

title: Remove empty element return value documentation
